scenes.action_text: ON BLACK:  	"A MAN MUST LOOK AT HIS LIFE AND THINK LUXURY."  	FADE IN:  	EXT. GUARJIRA, COLOMBIA - 1989 - DAY  A majestic panorama of the lush green slopes that are the Columbian highlands.  A faint chopping sound IS HEARD and then another.  WHOOSH.  WHOOSH.
